title: Syntax Highlighting and Automatic Linking
text: downlit two slightly different highlighting/linking engines: highlight() works multiline code blocks syntax highlighting, function linking, comment styling. autolink() works inline code linking. Multiline code blocks : Code syntax highlighted using R’s parser. Function calls automatically linked corresponding documentation. Comments styled transforming ANSI escapes sequences HTML equivalents (thanks fansi package). following forms inline code recognized automatically linked: fun(), pkg::fun(). ?fun, pkg::fun, type?topic. help("fun"), help("fun", package = "package"), help(package = "package"). vignette("name"), vignette("name", package = "package"). library(package), require(package), requireNamespace("package"). {package} gets linked (possible) formatted plain text.

text: Supports new base pipe |> syntax (#126). Every line get <span> match pandoc (#122). Multi-line tokens (e.g. strings) now get <span> per line (#139). long strings tokens longer truncated (@dmurdoch, #128).

title: downlit 0.4.0
text: CRAN release: 2021-10-29

title: downlit 0.4.0
text: Messages, warnings, errors now get much minimal style. Messages styled way output; warnings errors style “Warning” “Error” text. makes types output easier read, easier package developers style . Messages, warnings, errors now retrieve text using conditionMessage(), supports advanced types conditions (@davidchall, #100). overall structure syntax highlighting overhauled. Now line wrapped <span> class r-(input code), r-(output printed console), r-plot (plots), r-msg (messages), r-wrn (warnings), r-err (errors). Additionally, prompt (#>) wrapped <span class="r-pr">. Altogether, changes give much flexibility styling CSS (#90). ANSI escapes longer generate invalid HTML (#79). Changes better support HTML widgets rgl pkgdown (@dmurdoch, #78). particular, evaluate_and_highlight() now returns additional attribute containing extra dependencies needed render returned HTML.

title: downlit 0.4.0
text: Packages attached call library(package) (including tidyverse), now taken account autolinking (#87). code blocks, custom infix operators now autolinked (#89). inline code, infix operators longer autolinked; lead many false positives. can still link (e.g.) ?"-" (#86). Inline calls arguments (e.g. foo(1, 2)) longer auto-linked, intended documented (#82). Autolinking vignette(foo, package = "pkg") longer errors pkg installed (#85). Unusual help calls (e.g. help($b)), longer generate errors (#77). Rare warning incomplete final line autolink_url("pkgname::foo") now suppressed (@dmurdoch, pkgdown#1419). href_package() now exported (#103). Auto-linking likely succeed remote package installed downlit now looks URL using tools::CRAN_package_db() CRAN packages, available.packages() packages installed non-CRAN repos (@ARawles, #108). Functions HTML <summary> elements longer autolinked (@gadenbuie, #105).

title: downlit 0.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2020-11-04 auto-linking vignette(foo), downlit now looks vignette named foo packages knows attached (#61). Can now force highlighting <pre> wrapping inside <div> class = "downlit". useful cases may otherwise hard set class <pre>. comments, \u2029 converted \033 make possible preserve ANSI escapes passed xml2. longer errors library calls named empty arguments.

title: downlit 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-09-25 Autolinking can use metadata stored package pkgdown setting deploy.install_metadata; useful packages private websites (@matthewstrasiotto, #29) Autolinking guesses reference article urls pkgdown sites haven’t set url (@krlmlr, #44). R6 classes autolinked new object created .e. r6_object$new(), r6_object link docs (#59, @maelle). R6 methods longer autolinked functions name (#54, @maelle). classes_pandoc() classes_chroma() thoroughly revieweed produce syntax highlighting similar possible RStudio. downlit_html_path() flexible XPath identifying R code blocks, classes argument (#53, @maelle, @cderv) Trailing / longer stripped URLs (#45, @krlmlr). Removed extra newline <pre> output (#42, @krlmlr).
